content.raw: This is behavior we noticed and where trying to correct for as well. However being told that we are not suppose to subscribe to or use gazebo topics it makes it quite hard to find what that deviation is. Our scoring for qual1 is coming in pretty close, generally within this deviation. I am not sure if we should be trying to push those scores all the way down to zero or if being within that deviation for qual 1 is acceptable.
